text: [Music]
Dole is a very traditional kind of
oldfashioned company we're not a hot
startup we don't build web apps or
anything like that but AWS really helps
us with our operational efficiency and
gives us a great price point for what
they provide and it's one of those great
um combinations of reliability and
cost I'm Joanna Dyer I'm the director of
IT solutions for the do food company
doll as is really well known for bananas
and pineapples but we do a lot more than
that uh we do bagged salads and lots of
berries and fresh fruit frozen fruit Etc
we distribute in 90 countries and we've
got about 36,000 employees when we were
um looking um we definitely did a price
comparison between on premise
traditional hosting and Cloud providers
and obviously the cloud came out as way
cheaper we didn't have to actually go
and buy Capital purchases for the
hardware and then I actually stood up a
comparison of all of the then Cloud
providers uh and just did a cost
comparison on them and AWS was by far
the cheapest we're probably one of the
really earlier doctors and we actually
did a proof of concept by lifting and
shifting one of our applications into it
we proved it would work and it was
working really well so when we came to
look for a place to put our SharePoint
inst store we actually uh built out a
virtual private Cloud effectively using
it as an extension of our data center we
connect to it via uh VPN and essentially
um treat it as just an extension of our
data center we run SharePoint globally
out of there we have our corporate bi uh
mobile applications and we also do um Dr
protection for ourselves we store our PC
images our Dr documentation we replicate
our DNS into the cloud and that's great
for us because then that's a survivable
data center even if we lose one of our
major uh host in-house data centers we
use two availability zones we load
balance between them our web front ends
are load balanced and I have an active
passive mirroring of SQL uh to contain
the data from SharePoint um we run a DMZ
out of the environment so we can be open
to external users and I have uh VPC uh
VPC connections um from two of our data
centers using dual routers so we've
basically got uh kind of always on
environment we've been able to stand up
things like um uh websites for our Port
operations in a matter of hours and the
combin combination of AWS and SharePoint
enabled us to do very flexible builds
for internet sites we can grow any time
we want we don't have to go and acquire
new hardware we had uh great success
with the initial cost savings we didn't
have to put any capital in saved us at
least
$350,000 I'm a great champion of the
cloud we basically have taken AWS and
really uh adopted it in a huge way I
think it's going to get get bigger and
bigger and bigger for us over time
they're so responsive to our needs they
really listen to the customer and are
very quick to give us what we need to do
uh our jobs better
